blogPost.excerpt: Stream’s UI + SDKs for in-app chat allow you to build a beautiful and scalable chat experience in hours. 50+ handcrafted screens for Figma & Sketch. UI components for Flutter, React Native, Kotlin & Swift. Free maker accounts available for side projects.
blogPost.body: Stream’s UI + SDKs for in-app chat allow you to build a beautiful and scalable chat experience in hours. 50+ handcrafted screens for Figma & Sketch. UI components for Flutter, React Native, Kotlin & Swift. Free maker accounts available for side projects.
blogPost.title: Mobile Chat Kit - UI kits & sample apps for building in-app mobile chat
blogPost.author: Alex Iskold

localize.description: Stream的UI+SDK的应用内聊天功能，让你可以在几个小时内构建一个漂亮的、可扩展的聊天体验。为Figma和Sketch手工制作的50多个屏幕。Flutter、React Native、Kotlin & Swift的UI组件。免费的制造者账户可用于副项目。
localize.tagline: 用于构建应用内移动聊天的UI套件和示例应用。

localize.description: Stream的UI+SDK的應用內聊天功能，讓你可以在幾個小時內構建一個漂亮的、可擴展的聊天體驗。爲Figma和Sketch手工製作的50多個屏幕。Flutter、React Native、Kotlin & Swift的UI組件。免費的製造者賬戶可用於副項目。
localize.tagline: 用於構建應用內移動聊天的UI套件和示例應用。

previous.excerpt: Rollups lets you replace the constant stream of emails flooding your inbox by bundling all of your mailing lists into one digest email, sent weekly.
previous.title: Rollups by Leave Me Alone - Combine newsletters into weekly digest emails 💌

localize.description: 通过将所有的邮件列表捆绑成一个摘要邮件，每周发送一次，卷积可以让您取代不断涌入您的收件箱的邮件流。
localize.tagline: 将新闻通讯合并到每周的摘要邮件中💌。

localize.description: 通過將所有的郵件列表捆綁成一個摘要郵件，每週發送一次，卷積可以讓您取代不斷湧入您的收件箱的郵件流。
localize.tagline: 將新聞通訊合併到每週的摘要郵件中💌。
